agenda_items.title: Confirmation of the Minutes of the 48th Meeting of the Board of Governors
agenda_items.details: The minutes of the 48th BoG meeting held on October 03, 2019, were confirmed after incorporating comments from the Dy. Secretary (Finance), IFD, MHRD, with regard to Item No. 48.9, and the line 'During the proceedings of this discussion, the Registrar went outside and did not participate.' was added.

agenda_items.title: Consideration of recommendations of the 29th Senate meeting held on February 27, 2019
agenda_items.details: The Board approved agenda items S/29/14, S/29/15, S/29/17, S/29/21, and S/29/24. Regarding S/29/14, pertaining to opening of a multidisciplinary center, Members opined the Institute may apply separately to the Ministry of HRD for a grant.

agenda_items.title: Consideration of recommendations of the 30th Senate meeting held on September 27, 2019
agenda_items.details: The Board approved the minutes. Agenda S/30/32 does not involve financial liability, and necessary permission was acquired. Agenda S/30/A/03: the original number of seats can be restored as per course demand.

agenda_items.title: Consideration of recommendations of the 31st Senate meeting scheduled on November 06, 2019
agenda_items.details: The Board approved and confirmed the minutes of the 31st Senate meeting.
